Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.example.demo.Scene_Manipulator.Scene_Properties
com.example.demo.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Scene_Properties
Main menu scene for the game, displaying the title and buttons to start or exit the game. It also handles background music and scene setup.
